attributes.action: Launch a Serious Fraud Office Investigation into corruption within the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to recent breaking news regarding the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) multitude of 'fixed' phone-in competitions. We the undersigned wish a full Serious Fraud Office or National Audit Office investigation into the practises used by the BBC to conduct it's competitions. A full investigation and audit into how the BBC is spending tax payer and licence fee monies, to uncover the possible use of tax payer and or license fee monies for corrupting purposes to influence its competitions.

The BBC has admitted that it willfully corrupted competitions involved in the following
Comic Relief
Sport Relief
Children in Need
The Liz Kershaw Show
TMi

We the undersigned demand clarification if tax payer and or license fee monies have been mis-used for corrupting influence to benefit individuals within BBC or it's sub-contracted organisations
